product_name: Weed, Seed & Feed Your Lawn Kit
description:
The ultimate lawn care trio

Grow your best lawn with this simple Sunday lawn system.

This kit gives you everything needed for a complete lawn renovation: control weeds, fill in thin spots, and boost nutrients all in one package. Dandelion Doom targets broadleaf weeds without harming grass, while Sun & Shade Seed + Feed combines premium grass seed with essential nutrients for thick, resilient turf. The included sprayer makes precise weed treatment easy. Perfect for northern and transition zone lawns looking for a complete solution without harsh chemicals.

sections.product_features:
Complete lawn care system in one kit

Lawn-safe formula kills broadleaf weeds

No harsh chemicals for a safer lawn
For cool-season grass types
sections.whats_included:
Two bags of Sun & Shade Seed + Feed (9-0-2 NPK with premium grass seed)
One bottle of Dandelion Doom Herbicide Concentrate (controls broadleaf weeds)
sections.instructions:
For best results, apply in spring or fall when temperatures are between 55-75°F:
Mix Dandelion Doom concentrate into the herbicide pouch and attach the wand sprayer
Spot-treat weeds across the lawn, avoiding newly seeded areas and wait 24 hours before doing anything else
Apply Sun & Shade Seed + Feed uniformly across your lawn at the recommended rate, water thoroughly and allow to dry completely
Water the lawn regularly until seed germination (8-21 days)
sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Lawn Advisors:
Why combine weed control, seeding, and feeding?
This system creates a healthier lawn by addressing the three most important aspects of lawn care simultaneously: removing weeds eliminates competition, adding seed fills in bare spots, and fertilizing provides essential nutrients for stronger growth.
When is the best time to apply this kit?
Apply when temperatures are consistently between 55-75°F, typically in spring or fall. Apply weed control when weeds are actively growing. Avoid applying if rain is expected within three hours.
Can I use this kit on any lawn?
This kit is designed for cool-season grass types found in northern and transition zones. It works best on established lawns that need renovation.
Is this product safe for kids and pets?
Yes. It's safe to return to the lawn after weed control and seeded areas have dried. However, for optimal results, especially for seed germination, limit traffic on newly seeded areas until grass is established.
How soon will I see results?
You'll begin seeing results in 8-21 days, depending on moisture and temperature conditions. New grass will continue to fill in and thicken over the following weeks.
Are there any US states where this is not approved for use?
This product is approved for use in all northern states.
